articles.author: Aditya Chaturvedi
articles.title: Australia cruise to series win as Team India extends unwanted record - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Not since 2011 had India won the deciding match of a T20I series against any team and the visitors made sure to extend that streak.  | Cricket
articles.content: Since the start of their tour about three weeks earlier, a number of Australian players had spoken about how India have been closing the gap on them in recent years. Harmanpreet Kaur and Co lived up … [+3808 chars]
